offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Aberdeen attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Gay Berg.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.

offences.offenceSummary: On 01/01/2016 at London assaulted Clemons Mcintyre by beating him.
offences.act: Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.
